General.Name: Yunnan luoping Zinc & Electricity Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Luoping Zinc&Electricity Co., Ltd. engages in mining and processing lead-zinc ores in China. The company processes zinc ingots, zinc alloys, lead concentrates, germanium concentrates, silver concentrates, cadmium ingots, ultra-fine zinc powder and by-product lead slag, copper concentrates, etc. It is also involved in hydropower generation. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Luoping, China.
General.Address: South Section of Jiulong Avenue, Luoping, China, 655800
